title: EZ Link Card
description: The main object is a rectangular EZ-Link card with a white background, featuring the logo "ezlink" in the upper right corner and a red circle in the center containing "SG 50" in white font, surrounded by various colorful illustrations, including a red speech bubble with "lah" inside, and a trail of dotted lines connected to an airplane at the top.

title: Pencil Case
description: The main object is an off-white, rectangular pencil case with rounded corners and a front pocket featuring a beige patch that reads "Special" and "You are one in a million". Attached to the zipper is a charm consisting of a black Lego figure, several black and white beads, and a silver heart.

title: IPad
description: The image features a silver iPad with a multi-lens camera system in the top left corner, an Apple logo in the center, "iPad" printed near the bottom, and a white Apple Pencil resting diagonally across the surface. The iPad has regulatory markings and three small dots near the bottom edge.

title: Green Wallet
description: The image features a square-shaped, green leather wallet with a front flap that closes with a small button, and visible stitching around the edges that add a rustic touch. It appears to be of high-quality craftsmanship, with a distressed or aged texture, and includes details like a leather loop closure.

title: Water Bottle
description: The main object in the image is a light pink Owala water bottle with a white lid and a brown accent ring. The bottle is made of metal and features the "owala." logo printed in white.

title: Green Wallet and Keys
description: The main object in the image is a green leather cardholder embossed with the words "Every Other Thursday" in delicate white script, holding a variety of cards, including an American Express card, and cash, attached to a brass carabiner-style keyring holding keys. The cardholder and keyring are held in a human hand.

title: Black Wallet
description: The main object is a black nylon wallet, folded open to reveal cash and cards, including a black business debit card with the Mastercard logo. A stitched logo patch that reads "RECYCLED FIREFIGHTER" in white letters is visible on the front.

title: Black Mouse
description: A black computer mouse with a distinctive open-lattice design, featuring red internal illumination, is being held in a person's hand. The mouse has multiple buttons on its top and visible logos, suggesting it is a high-performance gaming accessory.

title: Glasses
description: The image showcases a pair of stylish eyeglasses featuring a black, square-shaped frame with subtle detailing on the temples and clear lenses with a slight blue tint. The glasses have a double bridge made of thin gold-colored metal, adding a touch of sophistication to their design.

title: Keys
description: The main object is a silver key with the word "KALE" engraved on its head, attached to a silver keyring with a decorative charm featuring various beads, a star, a fish-shaped glass bead, and a small square image depicting a blue object.

title: Power Bank
description: The image shows a rectangular, rounded-edge, light purple power bank with a small circular button on one end; a white USB cord is plugged into the bottom of the power bank, with the other end of the cord ending in a USB plug.

title: Green Wallet
description: The image depicts a dark green leather wallet with white stitching around the edges, featuring a subtle embossed logo of a winged emblem with a crown on the front. The wallet has a bifold design and appears to be made of textured leather.

title: Headphones
description: The main object is a pair of white Sony WH-CH720N noise-canceling headphones, each earcup decorated with iridescent, cartoonish stickers featuring butterflies, musical notes, clouds, and abstract shapes. The headphones have a sleek, modern design and sit atop their original box.

title: Air Pods
description: The image features a pair of white Apple AirPods in a pink silicone case, with one AirPod being held in a hand. The case is open, revealing the interior and the other AirPod nestled inside.

title: Lanyard
description: The main object is a light purple lanyard with a badge holder featuring a smiling daisy and the phrase "Seventeenth Heaven", connected by a black clasp. The lanyard itself is decorated with whimsical shapes, flowers, and the same "Seventeenth Heaven" text in red.

title: Mouse
description: The object is a beige and white wireless computer mouse shaped like a hamster, with black eyes, a small pink nose, brown stripes, and a ridged scroll wheel on top.

title: Casio Watch
description: The image showcases a white Casio F-91W digital watch featuring a white case, strap, and buckle, and a digital display with red digits showing "88 38" at the top and "88:88'88" below. The watch face is labelled "CASIO" and "F-91W" above the screen, and "WR" below.
